newsitem.title: USA: Finova Group sets two-for-one stock split.
newsitem.headline: Finova Group sets two-for-one stock split.

text.p: Finova Group Inc said Thursday its board declared a two-for-one split of its common stock in the form of a 100 percent common stock distribution.
The finance company said the distribution will take place on October 1 to shareholders of record on September 1.
The company also raised its quarterly dividend to $0.28 per share from $0.24 on a presplit basis.
The company's stock rose 1/4 to 84-3/4 Thursday afternoon.
